name: create_contact
description: Creates a new contact in Google Contacts using personal details. A `given_name` is required, along with at least one additional detail: `family_name`, `email`, or `phone`.

given_name.description: The first name of the contact. This value must be a non-empty string.

family_name.description: The last name of the contact.

email.description: The contact's email address. This address must be unique and formatted correctly.

name: delete_contact
description: Deletes a contact from your Google Contacts using its specified resource name. Directory contacts and 'otherContacts' cannot be deleted with this method.

resource_name.description: The resource name of the contact to delete, which must be formatted as `people/*`.

name: get_contact
description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific contact, identified by either their resource name (`people/*`) or email address.

identifier.description: The contact's unique identifier, provided as either a resource name formatted as `people/*` or an email address.

name: get_other_contacts
description: Retrieves contacts from the "Other contacts" section, which contains people you have interacted with but have not explicitly added to your contacts.

max_results.description: The maximum number of results to return, which must be a positive integer. Defaults to 50.

name: list_contacts
description: Lists all Google contacts, or filters the list to return only contacts that match a specified name.

name_filter.description: A string used to filter contacts by name. If this parameter is omitted, all contacts are returned.

max_results.description: The maximum number of contacts to return, which must be a positive integer. Defaults to 100 if not specified.

name: list_workspace_users
description: Lists Google Workspace users from the organization's directory. Allows for filtering results with a search query and controlling the number of users returned.

query.description: A search term for finding specific users by their name, email address, or phone number.

max_results.description: The maximum number of results to return. This value must be a positive integer and defaults to 50.

name: search_contacts
description: Searches for contacts by matching a query against their name, email, or phone number. The number of results returned can be limited.

query.description: A search term to find contacts by matching against their names, emails, and phone numbers.

max_results.description: The maximum number of results to return, which must be a positive integer. If this parameter is not specified, it defaults to 10.

name: search_directory
description: Searches for people in your organization's Google Workspace directory. The search can be targeted by a person's name, email address, or phone number.

query.description: The query for searching directory members by name, email, or phone number.

max_results.description: The maximum number of results to return, which defaults to 20.

name: update_contact
description: Updates an existing contact with new information. An update requires that at least one optional parameter is provided.

resource_name.description: The unique resource name that identifies the contact. It must be formatted as `people/*`, where `*` represents the contact's specific ID.

given_name.description: The updated first name for the contact.

family_name.description: The updated last name for the contact.

email.description: The new email address for the contact. This value will update the contact's primary email address.

phone.description: The contact's new phone number. This value updates the primary phone number; if no primary number exists, it updates the first phone number on record.
